title: Battle Of Warsaw 1920 (2011)

Battle Of Warsaw 1920(1920 Bitwa Warszawska)


Battle of Warsaw 1920 (pol. Bitwa warszawska 1920) is a Polish historical film directed by Jerzy Hoffman depicting the events of the Battle of Warsaw (1920) of the PolishÃ¢â‚¬â€œSoviet War as seen through the eyes of two young protagonists, Ola and Jan. She is a Warsaw cabaret dancer, while he is a cavalry officer and poet who believes in socialist ideals. It was released in September 2011. It was filmed in 3D using the Fusion Camera System.

This is an unzipped and renamed/edited re-upload of the "PROPER DVDRip XviD-AFO" version (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7006344/Battle_Of_Warsaw_1920_2011_PROPER_DVDRip_XviD-AFO). That torrent (of which there are 2 copies) sucks because it uses zip files, which don't even have a "zip" file ending, meaning you have to go through a slightly complicated procedure to be able to unzip the files. The other two available torrents sort of suck as well, the "x264.DTS-WAF" version has too many files for my liking. I suspect because it's DTS. The "SWESUB.720p.BluRay.D" version is 4.5GB! Despite that it's apparently bad quality as well.

Anyways, so I decided to do a reupload since there are obviously people who want to download this movie. Unzipped and renamed. I left it as two 700MB files for those who like to burn their films to disc. Although who still does that now-a-days?! The unzipped subtitles are the English ones, the others are in the zip file. Thanks to the original uploader despite the crap "format". :-)

PS: I haven't watched the movie yet myself, just flicked through. Visiually it reminds me of TV Films/Dramas and the IMDB rating of 4/10 suggests it's ok, probably a movie you'll watch once and then delete, despite the very eye catching lead actress.
